The sender of the tokens is assigned as the grant manager.","params":{"_amount":"Approved amount for the transfer to create the grant.","_extraData":"The following values encoded with `abi.encode`: seconds of the cliff before which no tokens will unlock. revocable (bool) Whether the token grant is revocable or not. policy (address) Address of the staking policy to be used.","_from":"The owner of nodes.name: ManagedGrantFactory
receiveApproval
createManagedGrant

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Unlocking cliff duration must be less or equal total unlocking duration."

arguments.value: Unlocking cliff duration must be less or equal total unlocking duration.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Unlocking cliff duration must be less or equal total unlocking duration."

attributes.name: ManagedGrantFactory
receiveApproval
createManagedGrant

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Unlocking cliff duration must be less or equal total unlocking duration."

attributes.type: literal_string "Unlocking cliff duration must be less or equal total unlocking duration."
attributes.value: Unlocking cliff duration must be less or equal total unlocking duration.

createManagedGrant(address,uint256,uint2.details: At least `amount` tokens to be approved for the factory beforehand. The grant will use the staking policy specified for its type (revocable or non-revocable) when the factory was created. The msg.sender is assigned as the grant manager.

params.amount: The number of tokens to grant.
params.cliffDuration: Duration in seconds of the cliff before which no tokens will unlock.
params.duration: Duration in seconds of the unlocking period.
params.policy: Address of the staking policy to be used.
params.revocable: Whether the token grant is revocable or not.
params.start: Timestamp at which unlocking will start.

createManagedGrant(address,uint256,uint2.return: The address of the managed grant.

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,.details: Requires no setup beforehand, but only provides the managed grant address through an event. The sender of the tokens is assigned as the grant manager.

params._amount: Approved amount for the transfer to create the grant.
params._extraData: The following values encoded with `abi.encode`: grantee (address) Address of the grantee. duration (uint256) Duration in seconds of the unlocking period. start (uint256) Timestamp at which unlocking will start. cliffDuration (uint256) Duration in seconds of the cliff before which no tokens will unlock. revocable (bool) Whether the token grant is revocable or not. policy (address) Address of the staking policy to be used.
params._from: The owner of the tokens who approved them to transfer.
params._token: Address of the token contract; must match the token specified when the factory was created.

createManagedGrant(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Create a managed grant with the given parameters.

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,.notice: Create a managed grant with the parameters specified in `_extraData`.

userdoc.notice: Creates managed grants that permit grantee reassignment and use pre-defined staking policies.
